appSubDescription: Scan, store, and search your business cards effortlessly.
digitalCardDescription: Create and share your personal digital business card.
noCardsFoundDescription: Your saved business cards will appear here. Try scanning one!
scanCardInstruction: Position the card within the frame and capture.
cameraErrorDescription: Could not access the camera. Please check your browser permissions.
cameraAccessDeniedDescription: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings to use this feature.
aiAnalysisFailedDescription: Could not analyze the card. Please try again.
cardSavedDescription: The new business card has been added to your portfolio.
fileTooLargeDescription: Please select an image smaller than 2MB.
fetchDataErrorDescription: Could not load your card data from the backend. Using default data.
saveSuccessDescription: Your digital business card has been updated.
unknownErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred during save. Please check your Firebase security rules are deployed.
savedCardsDescription: View, search, and manage all your scanned business cards here.
deleteCardDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the business card from your account.
cardDeletedDescription: The business card has been successfully deleted.
editCardDescription: Update the details of the scanned business card below.
